Class IntegrationModel

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.integration.model.IntegrationModel
public class IntegrationModel extends Object
Model class for handling parameters and performing trapezoidal integration.
Version:
3.0 final
Author:
Sebastian Legierski InfK4

  • Method Details

    • readArgs

      public void readArgs(String[] args) throws IntegrationException
      Reads command-line arguments for integration parameters.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      Throws:
      IntegrationException - if any required argument is missing or invalid.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Checks if the model is in a READY state.
      Returns:
      true if the state is READY, false otherwise.

    • setMode

      public void setMode(char mode) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the integration mode by creating the appropriate strategy.
      Parameters:
      mode - Character representing the mode ('d' for divisions, 'w' for width).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the mode is invalid.

    • setIntegrationStrategy

      public void setIntegrationStrategy(IntegrationStrategyEnum integrationStrategy) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the integration mode by creating the appropriate strategy.
      Parameters:
      integrationStrategy - The integration strategy to use.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the strategy is invalid.

    • setStrategy

      public void setStrategy(IntegrationStrategy strategy)
      Sets the integration strategy.
      Parameters:
      strategy - The integration strategy to use.

    • flipBounds

      public void flipBounds()
      Flips the lower and upper bounds if needed.

    • calculate

      public double calculate() throws IntegrationException
      Calculates the integration result using the selected strategy.
      Returns:
      The result of the integration.
      Throws:
      IntegrationException - if no strategy is set.

    • getRange

      public PairRecord getRange()
      Retrives range of integration
      Returns:
      PairRecord with lower and upper bound
